title: Engineering Education Design Utilizing Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering concepts and fundamental computer application skills
context.additional_context: Corporate in-service training program conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Operated through a blended approach combining theoretical learning and practical activities

learning_goals: Learners can understand basic network management concepts and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can effectively perform collaborative activities with peers using CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning) tools.
Learners can experience a collaboration-based problem-solving process through learning design tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
